package.description: The package cob_canopen_motor implements a controller-drive component which is connected to a can-bus and works with a canopen-interface. "CanDriveItf" provides a - more or less - generic interface to the controller-drive components. "CanDrvie..." then implements a specific setup, e.g. an ELMO Harmonica Controller in case of the "CanDriveHarmonica".
package.author: Christian Connette
